Check with https://www.stat.ubc.ca/~rollin/stats/ssize/b2.html

```{r}
library(pwr)
pwr.2p.test(
       h=ES.h(0.6,0.8),
       n=NULL,
       sig.level=0.05,
       power=0.80,
       alternative="two.sided")

```


```{r}
library(pwr)
power.prop.test(n = NULL, 
                p1 = .6, 
                p2 = .8,
                power=0.8,
                sig.level=0.05,
                alternative="two.sided"
                ) 
```
